Recipe.title: Manti Turkey
Recipe.Source: From turkey farmers in Manti, Utah
Recipe.Description:
The youth in our ward did a service project where they went to Manti and helped do some spring cleaning at some turkey farms. When they were done, the farmers fed them this recipe and they loved it!
We were able to get the recipe and here it is.

section.instruction: In a large bowl place Soda, Soy Sauce, Vegetable Oil, Garlic Powder, and Horseradish then mix well.
Add Turkey Tenders and make sure they are well covered with the Marinade.
Remove Turkey Tenders from Marinade and grill 1st side on BBQ for ≈??? minutes.
Flip all Turkey Tenders, dipping them in the Marinade, then grill for ≈??? minutes.

Modifications.modification: The original recipe called for Cola instead of Lemon-Lime Soda, but pretty much any flavor can be used. (Ransom's favorite is Ginger Ale.)
